ygData.subject: RE: AAAAAACCCCCCCCKKKKKKKK!!!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Just move the spells to the last page in the spellbook. That s what I had to do with my druid spells. It s a hassle, but you only got to do them once *smile*
ygData.messageBody:
Just move the spells to the last page in the spellbook. That's what I had
to do with my druid spells. It's a hassle, but you only got to do them
once *smile*

Daki, Tunare server

On Fri, 29 Oct 1999, Wilson, ThomasX B wrote:

> Oh something that was kind of bugging me, is there anyway to delete a spell
> from your spell book? The since the new lifetaps didn't overwrite the
> existing spells I still have them in my book (and obviously can't use
> them).. I've moved them to like page 15 or so, but would like to delete
> them. Any ideas?
>
